str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From phobos; to frighten, i.e. to be alarmed; by analogy, to be in awe of, i.e. Revere.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
From exesti; privilege, i.e. force, capacity, competency, freedom, or mastery, delegated influence.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
